page.title: 19EDUCATION IN BOURNE
page.content: Bourne has{five schools}within its boudary. There are{two primary}schools Bourne County Primary (430 children) - Headmaster Mr.R.Wright and Westfield C.P.(360 children),Headmistress Mrs.J. Woollard.These two schools send their pupils after a selection procedure to the{secondary schools}- Bourne Grammar School(400 children), Headmaster Mr.J. Nicholson and Bourne County Secondary School(670 mixed), Headmaster Mr.M.Kee Both the secondary and primary schools also take children from a wider area, stretching from Thurlby in the south to Aslackby in the north and Grimsthorpe in the west. Next door to the Grammar School in South Road is the Willoughby School, Headmistress Mrs.J.O'Reilly, which caters for approximately twenty handi- capped children in this area of South Lincolnshire.
